about.title: About NovaSEO
about.content: NovaSEO is a powerful SEO and backlink analysis tool designed to help you optimize your website and improve your search engine rankings. With advanced features and a user-friendly interface, NovaSEO makes it easy to analyze your site's performance and identify opportunities for improvement.

features.title: Key Features
features.content:
• Comprehensive SEO Analysis
• Detailed Backlink Mapping
• Competitor Analysis
• Keyword Research
• AI-Powered Recommendations
• Performance Tracking
• Custom Reports
• Multi-Language Support
